1.content: okay time to chose a anime
1.title: the start.

11.content: yes! time to select a story line.
11.title: Pokemon (my favorite)

info.brief_description: Nearly anythings goes. Point will be given for good addition.
info.description:
Okay here is the rules its not many so please follow them.
0) don’t worry about the ratings I can raise it if becomes necessary
1) only English, you can have some words in other languish but make sure to have a translate at the bottom of the chapter

2) shows that's like anime are allowed ex(avatar, winx club, teen titans)

3) please don’t go overboard with the OC`s, if it is to get the story rolling or there is not enough existing characters then its okay, but use existing characters as much as possible

4. Please use comprehensible spelling and grammar to the best of your abilities. I don't want chapters full of nonsensical gibberish that no one can understand.

5) don’t make characters OoC without a reason for them to be OoC

6) I will not give any points for choice chapters, and if you add a choice chapter and it has not resulted in a story (other choices don’t count) after 1 week it will be deleted.

7) size-difference should be the focus of the story(giant and/or shrunken guy/girl and or animals) but all transformation(age increase/decrease, animal and body-part) are okay

8) after having chosen a franchise please choice between a canon or alternative story line. Where canon would be a exact(or nearly) copy of the franchise story line, while alternative would be more free

9) to have as help you can use this https://www.mrinitialman.com/OddsEnds/Sizes/compsizes.xhtml

10) please have fun :)
